edition: Hymni Homerici, creator; Hesiod, creator; Homer, creator; Evelyn-White, Hugh G. (Hugh Gerard), d. 1924, translator

text.0:
Sing, clear-voiced Muse, of Castor and Polydeuces, the Tyndaridae, who sprang from
 Olympian Zeus. Beneath the heights of Taygetus stately Leda bare them, when the dark-clouded
 Son of Cronos had privily bent her to his will.
text.1: Hail, children of Tyndareus, riders upon swift horses!

author: homeric hymns
